entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 12:09AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Washington and northeastern Wood Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1208 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Boaz, or near Marietta, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated.
